transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji hello, good morning.
Customer: Good morning, what's the time?
Executive: Actually, mera yaha Rao Enterprises Private Limited show ho rahi hai kya?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Awaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Haan haan, madam aa rahi hai na, batayein madam.
Executive: Ji ji ji, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu sir. Aapka mail mila tha hume. Shree ji ne, Rao ji ne shayad likha tha ki kuch physical assistance chahiye tha. Matlab ki koi agar onsite support koi mil paaye. But main batana chahungi sir ki ye abhi band ho chuka hai. Hum service nahi, onsite nahi provide kar sakte hai support. Koi bhi dikkat hai, koi bhi problem hai, hum video call pe aapko assist karenge. Aur abhi aapka profile hamare Noida head office pe hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ji, to physically koi possible nahi hai sir. Kuch bhi puchna hai, kuch bhi jaise regardingly unhone ye bhi likha hua tha ki as a renewal is due for seeking physical assistance for better upcoming plans. But sir main aapko bolna chahungi ki hum abhi nahi provide karte hai physical assistance. To kuch bhi problem hai, kuch bhi upcoming plans ki baat karni hai aur renewal ke liye karwana hai sir, to kya kehte hai aapko video call ke through ya jo main account manager hu, Keerti naam hai mera. Waise aap shayad Ranjan ji baat kar rahe honge.
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Hai na? To shayad mujhe hamari baat hui bhi thi sir. To ye possible nahi hai sir ki hum physically aap tak pahunche. Hum Noida head office se aapne baat kar rahi hu. Kuch bhi dikkat hai, kuch bhi problem hai, main video call pe aapko assist kar dungi. Kuch puchna hai, kuch regardingly to hum wo bata sakte hai sir aapko.
Customer: Okay, main aapko face to face guidance nahi mil paati hai sir. Haan ji batayein.
Customer: I understand your point. Aap mujhe thoda time dijiye, reason ye hai ki hume nahi pata Rao ne kya thoughts diye the usne wo bheja hai na, mujhe bas samay dijiye. Fir uske baad main aapko call kar leta hu.
Executive: Haan bilkul. Charges wagera jo Ranjan ji shayad aapko bata bhi tha humne. Aapka MDC jo basic plan chal raha hai uska one year hai, three year hai hamare paas. Isse better plan bhi hai jo TrustSeal ka hai, one year, two year, three year bhi hai sir. To wo aapke upar totally depend hai ki aap kis mein jaana chahte hai. Uske liye main assist kar dungi ki kaise payment hona hai, kaise sara sab kuch hona hai. Aap jaise baat kar lijiye meri Rahul ji se bhi baat hui thi mere paas us din Rahul ji ka hi call aaya tha Saturday wale din. Actually mein hum us din working nahi the to haan. To regardingly maine unko bata diya tha ki sir aisa hai ki hum physically available nahi ho paate.
Customer: Theek hai, main samajh gaya. Mujhe thoda sa time dijiye, main fir aapko call karta hu.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai. Baki jo ye concern tha sir mail ke through hai wo main close kar du?
Customer: Thoda time dijiye, thoda. Theek hai, thoda time dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai, kitni der mein call karu? Aap ek bari baat kar lijiye Rahul ji se ya Rao ji se.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Kyunki concern open tha sir, ye hume jald se jald aapka jaise aap baat kar lo koi nahi. Close karne ke liye aap ek bari bata dena ki main close kar dungi. Aap mujhe time bata dijiye us time main aapko call kar lu taki.
Customer: Approx, approx 12 baje tak aap mujhe time dijiye, tabhi just time mil payega.
Executive: Koi plan karti hu. Ranjan ji aapka ek bari WhatsApp number mujhe dobara se bata do sir. Maine number galat save kiya tha.
Customer: Haan, yes. 882521.
Executive: Ji, sir actually mein na ye recorded call hai hamari to mere ko number nahi show karta sir. Ek bari agar aap bas do char number bata denge.
Customer: 88.
Executive: 8825.
Customer: Sorry.
Customer: 882521.
Executive: 8825.
Customer: 21.
Executive: 21, haan.
Customer: 73.
Executive: 73.
Customer: 61.
Executive: 61. Main ek bari repeat kar deti hu sir. 88252. Haan 17361, right? Ji sir maine aapko WhatsApp kiya hua hai. Might be kuch network issue ki wajah se abhi gaya nahi hai aapko. To ye abhi aapko just pahunch jayega. Mera naam Keerti hai sir. Shayad aapko maine message bhi kiya tha shuru mein aapne mujhe call bhi kiye the karane ke liye hai na? To aapke paas number hoga mera. Aap number mera save bhi kar lijiye. Main dobara se kaam karti hu aapko 12 baje connect kar leti hu.
Customer: Okay madam, thank you.
Executive: Theek hai regardingly hai na? Baki service wagera theek chal raha hai? Service usage pe focus thoda sa kare sir. Okay to jo clients aa rahe hai local ke bhi ya Hawra ke ya West Bengal ke unse khas kar se baat kariye. Baki main ye bhi thoda sa bolna chahungi sir ki jo positive clients hote hai unse review rating.
Customer: Preeti madam ek meri ek meri ek sunenge. Abhi yes office aaya hu mujhe thoda 10 minute dijiye main thoda baith jaunga continuous bol rahe hai mujhe.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul theek hai. Main 12 baje tak connect karti hu fir aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants face-to-face guidance.

- Customer needs time to discuss renewal plans.



Resolution:

- Executive explained physical assistance is unavailable.

- Executive offered assistance via video call.

- Executive provided WhatsApp number for contact.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 12 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- physical assistance, renewal, video call, trustseal, mdc
